text: BMDC were cultured at 106 cells / mL in 10 mL of RPMI-1640 complete medium in the presence or absence of 100 ng / mL LPS or 25 microg / mL poly I : C .
After 1 and 2 hours , RNA was isolated with TRI-reagent ( Sigma ) according to the manufacturer 's instructions .

The expression of <extra_id_0> Il6 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> , <extra_id_0> Il12p40 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> , <extra_id_0> Gmcsf <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> , and <extra_id_0> Sharpin <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> mRNA was determined by qRT-PCR .

text: Primers and probes were purchased from Applied Biosystems .
Reverse transcription was performed at 42degreesC for 60 minutes with the final denaturation step at 90degreesC for 5 minutes in 30 microl containing 0.5 microg of total RNA .

dNTPs , oligo ( dT ) 15 primer , recombinant RNasin Ribonuclease Inhibitor , and <extra_id_0> M-MLV Reverse Transcriptase <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> ( all from Promega , Madison , WI ) were used according to the manufacturer 's instruction .
Reverse transcription was done in a PTC-200 Peltier Thermal Cycler ( MJ Research , Watertown , MA ) .

qRT-PCR was performed in ABI Prism 7700 Sequence Detection System with TaqMan ( R ) Gene Expression Assays ( Applied Biosystems , Foster City , CA ) for mouse <extra_id_0> Actb <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> , <extra_id_0> IL6 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> , <extra_id_0> IL12p40 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> , <extra_id_0> Ifnbeta <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> , <extra_id_0> Gmcsf <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> , and <extra_id_0> Sharpin <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> according to the manufacturer 's protocol .
The endogenous standard for normalization of the target gene was <extra_id_0> beta-actin <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> .
Relative gene expression was calculated using the 2-deltadeltaCt method [ 56 ] .
